rows.label: qst202320_msg007
rows.name:
To revive Thanatobeast Andraz, you
must destroy the four sealstones.

rows.label: qst202320_msg001
rows.name:
According to the poem,
their locations are...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202320_msg002
rows.name:
The stone of earth in a deep,
green forest... The stone of fire
in a hot, barren wasteland...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202320_msg003
rows.name:
The stone of water in a watery land of
eternal spring... The stone of wind in
a small land blessed by sea breezes...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202320_msg005
rows.name:
While you destroy the four sealstones,
I will ask my master where
Thanatobeast Andraz is sealed.

rows.label: qst202320_msg101
rows.name:
The place where the Thanatobeast
is sealed is called Xataris
Spring in Temperantia.

rows.label: qst202320_msg102
rows.name:
When you have safely
defeated it and returned,
please tell me the story.

rows.label: qst202320_msg103
rows.name:
I will write a poem about
Yaegiri-san's deeds!
